common.confirm-delete: The selected item will be moved to the Archived elements view. Continue ?
common.confirm-delete_plural: The {{count}} selected items will be moved to the Archived elements view. Continue ?
common.deleted: {{count}} record moved to the Archived elements view
common.deleted_plural: {{count}} records moved to the Archived elements view
common.restored: {{count}} record restored into the Active elements view
common.restored_plural: {{count}} records restored into the Active elements view

commonErrors.noResponse: The server did not respond to one of the requests made
commonErrors.unexpected: Error while trying to send data to server: {{message}}
commonErrors.invalidRange: The value must be between {{minValue}} and {{maxValue}}
commonErrors.invalidMaxValue: The value must be less than {{maxValue}}
commonErrors.invalidMinValue: The value must be greater than {{minValue}}
